dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5985 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 517 Seagaze Drive in Oceanside, California, as the “Charlesetta Reece Allen Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Levin (for himself, Mrs. Kim of California, Ms. Sánchez, Mrs. Steel, Mr. Correa, Mr. Issa, Ms. Porter, Mr. Peters, Ms. Jacobs, and Mr. Vargas) introduced the following bill
Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 517 Seagaze Drive in Oceanside, California, as the Charlesetta Reece Allen Post Office Building.

section.header: Charlesetta Reece Allen Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 517 Seagaze Drive in Oceanside, California, shall be known and designated as the Charlesetta Reece Allen Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Charlesetta Reece Allen Post Office Building.
